channel.title: Run server exception
channel.description:
I just added the dragon kiteshield into my server and when I compiled there was no problem but when I ran server this exception came up. This is after I added a id for the item in item.cfg also. All files have been compiled before this too.
Here is the code
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at itemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.(init)ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]

item.title: Run server exception
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Read the error message, it will tell you exactly where your problem is.

Read full topic

item.description:

I just added the dragon kiteshield into my server and when I compiled there was no problem but when I ran server this exception came up. This is after I added a id for the item in item.cfg also. All files have been compiled before this too.
